message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $160, which I believe reflects its true value.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
I understand your position, Bob, but $100 is significantly less than what I'm willing to accept. Could you meet me halfway at $130?
I'm still a bit far from $130. I'm willing to go up to $110, but I think that's as high as I can go.
